creator: AMANOTES
descriptionHtml:
📛Getting bored these days? 📛
This is the mobile game for you to kill your boredom at home 💘

As Music is the strongest form of magic, Magic Tiles 3 ™ is a precious gift, and at the same time a wonderful spell that Amanotes want to cast on you. Become a professional pianist with Magic Tiles 3 ™ now!

🔻NEW UPDATES

- NEW albums: totally new theme and effects in the game play and amazing songs.
- Starter Package: the chance to get Coins + Diamonds + Remove Ads with 75% off.

Don’t hesitate, just come and grab it!
Further, our piano game also collects all new and popular great songs every week in its weekly songs chart. Furthermore, when the speed of tiles is high enough, you can collect Easter Eggs with hidden gifts inside.

Thus, this is a special version with various genres of piano games combining diverse instruments such as guitar, drum, and especially piano! Magic Tiles 3 ™ has been featured by Google for 3 years which provides user the high-quality piano songs and beautiful gameplay.

Let’s tap the tiles, play the game on your mobile - Enjoy every mindful music moments!

Game’s rules:

It’s similar to other piano games, you just have to tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles then enjoy the wonderful music in game.
Game features:
- Band mode where you can play with more instruments such as guitar, piano, and others.
- Battle mode creates the opportunity for players to compete with others around the world which leads Magic Tiles 3™ become such a unique piano online.
- Especially, the advanced feature of battle mode – custom match - which let you to compete directly with your friends and whoever you want to.
- High-quality piano songs, and some popular pop music which are frequently updated
- The challenge mode which leads users to improve their tapping speed in order to rank on the top of the world.
Log in to your Facebook account and share data on multiple devices.
So, get ready and try out the fantastic piano games for free! The attractive piano online which is more challenging than you could imagine.
Permission: In order to provide the optimized experience, we would request “Storage” permission when you download this game

Become a real pianist now! And catch up the trend with this new piano game 2019 right now!

Support:
Are you having any problems? Send email to :magictiles3.support@amanotes.com or contact us in game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support.
Privacy Policy: https://goo.gl/2WNN1V

descriptionHtml:
📛Getting bored these days? 📛
This is the mobile game for you to kill your boredom at home 💘
Become a professional pianist with Magic Tiles 3 ™ now!

🔻NEW UPDATES

- NEW albums: totally new theme and effects in the game play and amazing songs.
- Subscription Package: Offers 1000+ premium songs and upcoming songs at price of $7.99 weekly.

Don’t hesitate, just come and grab it!
Further, our piano game also collects all new and popular great songs every week in its weekly songs chart. Furthermore, when the speed of tiles is high enough, you can collect Easter Eggs with hidden gifts inside.

Thus, this is a special version with various genres of piano games combining diverse instruments such as guitar, drum, and especially piano! Magic Tiles 3 ™ provides user the high-quality piano songs and beautiful gameplay.

Let’s tap the tiles, play the game on your mobile - Enjoy every mindful music moments!

Game’s rules:

It’s similar to other piano games, you just have to tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles then enjoy the wonderful music in game.
Game features:
- Band mode where you can play with more instruments such as guitar, piano, and others.
- Battle mode creates the opportunity for players to compete with others around the world which leads Magic Tiles 3™ become such a unique piano online.
- Especially, the advanced feature of battle mode – custom match - which let you to compete directly with your friends and whoever you want to.
- High-quality piano songs, and some popular pop music which are frequently updated
- The challenge mode which leads users to improve their tapping speed in order to rank on the top of the world.
Log in to your Facebook account and share data on multiple devices.
So, get ready and try out the fantastic piano games for free! The attractive piano online which is more challenging than you could imagine.

Become a real pianist now!

* Albums and their related contents are not included subscription privilege and may need separate purchases to unlock.
* You will be play all premium songs for the duration of your subscription.

It is a special game in different genres of piano games and wonderful gameplay.

Rule of the game :
It’s similar to other piano games, just tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles. That's all !

Game features:
- Real music feeling when tapping the black tiles
- Many HOT songs with great vocals are frequently updated
- Many genres of music: POP, EDM, classical, country, Latin,..

Do not hesitate to try free piano online! This excellent piano game has more challenges in store for you than you imagine.

Magic Tiles 3 is from Amanotes, the number one music games publisher in the world, with over one billion downloads. Music lovers can interact with thousand of songs through our different apps. Why just listen to music, if you can also play with it? At Amanotes, we believe that “everyone can music!”.

title:
Magic Tiles 3
11.024.006

creator: AMANOTES PTE LTD
descriptionHtml:
Magic Tiles 3: Tap into the Rhythm of Fun!

Do you adore piano games and grooving to your favorite tunes on piano tiles? Dive into the ultimate music adventure with Magic Tiles 3, a top-notch blend of magic piano games, rhythm challenges, and song games. It's your all-access pass to a world brimming with tunes, beats, and thrilling gameplay that turns every tap into a musical journey. Whether you're a fan of pop, EDM, hip hop, or country music, Magic Tiles 3 has something special just for you. Get ready to unleash your inner musician and discover why this game is a chart-topper in the world of music games!

𝐇𝐎𝐖 𝐓𝐎 𝐏𝐋𝐀𝐘:

Step into the spotlight with Magic Tiles 3, where your mission is to hit the right tiles to the beat of iconic songs, dodging those tricky white tiles. It's not just about hitting the notes; it's about embracing the rhythm and showcasing your reflexes and coordination. If you're up for a challenge that harmonizes your love for music with a test of skill, Magic Tiles 3 is your stage.

𝐆𝐀𝐌𝐄 𝐅𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐄𝐒:

A World of Music: With over 45,000 songs, Magic Tiles 3 offers an unrivaled musical treasure trove, spanning genres from pop to country songs, EDM to hip hop. Its vibrant graphics and smooth gameplay ensure you're hooked, making every session a new adventure in the realm of piano games.

Endless Challenges: New levels, new hits, and endless excitement await in this piano game. Each level brings its own flavor and challenge, with surprises and gifts to fuel your musical voyage. Magic Tiles 3 ensures the melody never fades and the excitement never ends.

Beat Battle Online: Step up in the global arena with Magic Tiles 3’s online mode. Connect with players worldwide and challenge friends to see who reigns supreme in this symphony of tiles. It's a perfect blend of competition and community, all set to the rhythm of your favorite tunes.

Dive into the rhythm of Magic Tiles 3 and let the music guide you to an experience filled with beats, songs, and challenges that will keep your fingers dancing and your heart racing. It's not just a game; it's a musical odyssey waiting to be explored. Download Magic Tiles 3 now and join the community of music lovers who’ve found their rhythm, tapped into their musical talent, and embarked on an unforgettable journey through the most engaging piano tiles game out there.

Support:
Encountering hiccups? We’re here to help! Email us at magictiles3.support@amanotes.com or find us in-game under Settings > FAQ and Support.

Terms of Use: https://www.amanotes.com/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://www.amanotes.com/privacy-policy/

Download Magic Tiles 3 today and let the music play!
descriptionShort: You love music games? Let's tap the magic piano tiles in the fun song game

title:
Magic Tiles 3: Piano Game
11.054.101

creator: AMANOTES PTE LTD
descriptionHtml:
Welcome back to the world of Magic Tiles 3, the ultimate destination for music games enthusiasts!

We’ve missed you and your magical touch on our piano tiles. We have a plethora of new songs, exciting updates, and special things waiting just for you. So why wait? Dive right in and let the music take control!

Magic Tiles 3 is more than just a game - it’s a symphony that brings together music lovers and gamers. With our vast library of songs, you’ll never run out of tunes to play. From classical to pop, we’ve got it all! And guess what? We’ve added even more songs to our collection. So, get ready to explore new melodies and set new high scores.

Our piano tiles are not just ordinary tiles, they’re the keys to a magical journey filled with music. Each tile is a note, and each note is a part of your favorite song. As you tap the tiles, you’re not just playing a game, you’re creating music. It’s like having a piano in your pocket!

Magic Tiles 3 isn’t just about the music, it’s a platform where you can express your love for music. Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, our game is designed to provide an enjoyable experience for all skill levels. And with our regular updates, there’s always something new to look forward to.

We understand that every player is unique, and that’s why we’ve introduced a range of exciting updates. From new game themes to improved gameplay mechanics, we’re constantly working to make Magic Tiles 3 the perfect music game. And don’t forget about our special gifts! They’re our way of saying thank you for being a part of our community.

So, are you ready to get back into the rhythm? Your favorite song game is just a tap away. Rekindle your love for music with Magic Tiles 3. Remember, the magic is in the tiles, and the music is in your hands. Let’s create some magic together!

Support:
Are you having any problems? Send an email to: magictiles3.support@amanotes.com or contact us in the game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support.

Terms of use: https://www.amanotes.com/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://www.amanotes.com/privacy-policy/
descriptionShort: Experience trending songs, tap the tiles in your favorite music piano game!

Magic Tiles 3: Tap into the Rhythm of Fun!

Do you adore piano games and grooving to your favorite tunes on piano tiles? Dive into the ultimate music adventure with Magic Tiles 3, a top-notch blend of magic piano games, rhythm challenges, and song games. It's your all-access pass to a world brimming with tunes, beats, and thrilling gameplay that turns every tap into a musical journey. Whether you're a fan of pop, EDM, hip hop, or country music, Magic Tiles 3 has something special just for you. Get ready to unleash your inner musician and discover why this game is a chart-topper in the world of music games!

𝐇𝐎𝐖 𝐓𝐎 𝐏𝐋𝐀𝐘:

Step into the spotlight with Magic Tiles 3, where your mission is to hit the right tiles to the beat of iconic songs, dodging those tricky white tiles. It's not just about hitting the notes; it's about embracing the rhythm and showcasing your reflexes and coordination. If you're up for a challenge that harmonizes your love for music with a test of skill, Magic Tiles 3 is your stage.

𝐆𝐀𝐌𝐄 𝐅𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐄𝐒:

A World of Music: With over 45,000 songs, Magic Tiles 3 offers an unrivaled musical treasure trove, spanning genres from pop to country songs, EDM to hip hop. Its vibrant graphics and smooth gameplay ensure you're hooked, making every session a new adventure in the realm of piano games.

Endless Challenges: New levels, new hits, and endless excitement await in this piano game. Each level brings its own flavor and challenge, with surprises and gifts to fuel your musical voyage. Magic Tiles 3 ensures the melody never fades and the excitement never ends.

Beat Battle Online: Step up in the global arena with Magic Tiles 3’s online mode. Connect with players worldwide and challenge friends to see who reigns supreme in this symphony of tiles. It's a perfect blend of competition and community, all set to the rhythm of your favorite tunes.

Dive into the rhythm of Magic Tiles 3 and let the music guide you to an experience filled with beats, songs, and challenges that will keep your fingers dancing and your heart racing. It's not just a game; it's a musical odyssey waiting to be explored. Download Magic Tiles 3 now and join the community of music lovers who’ve found their rhythm, tapped into their musical talent, and embarked on an unforgettable journey through the most engaging piano tiles game out there.

Support:
Encountering hiccups? We’re here to help! Email us at magictiles3.support@amanotes.com or find us in-game under Settings > FAQ and Support.

Terms of Use: https://www.amanotes.com/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://www.amanotes.com/privacy-policy/

title:
Magic Tiles 3: Piano Game
11.104.202

creator: AMANOTES PTE LTD
descriptionHtml:
Magic Tiles 3 est le jeu de musique ultime pour tous les fans de piano et de chansons. Avec ce jeu, vous pouvez jouer à des milliers de titres de tous les styles et de toutes les époques, du pop au rock en passant par le classique, le hip-hop, l’EDM et bien plus encore, le tout sur un piano virtuel.

Le principe du jeu est simple :

Appuyez sur les tuiles magiques qui apparaissent à l’écran en suivant le rythme de la musique sur le clavier du piano.
Ne touchez pas les tuiles blanches, sinon vous perdrez la partie.
Plus vous jouez vite et précisément, plus vous gagnez de points et de récompenses.
Vous pouvez également défier vos amis en mode multijoueur et voir qui est le meilleur pianiste !

Magic Tiles 3 vous offre des fonctionnalités incroyables :

Plus de 45,000 chansons de différents genres musicaux à jouer gratuitement sur votre piano virtuel.
De nouvelles chansons sont ajoutées chaque semaine pour vous offrir plus de choix et de variété.
Plusieurs modes de jeu pour tester votre vitesse, votre précision et votre endurance sur le piano.
Des graphismes colorés et des effets sonores réalistes pour une expérience immersive.
Un classement mondial pour comparer vos performances avec celles des autres joueurs.
Un mode hors ligne pour jouer sans connexion internet.

Mais ce n’est pas tout ! En devenant un membre VIP, vous pouvez :

Profiter du jeu sans publicité ni interruption.
Accéder à toutes les chansons premium et aux futures mises à jour.
Obtenir des vies illimitées pour jouer autant que vous voulez.
Créer votre propre playlist et jouer en boucle.
Télécharger les chansons pour les jouer hors ligne.

Le prix correspond à la valeur que la Grille tarifaire de l’App Store définit comme équivalent du prix de l’abonnement en dollars américains.
Les albums et leur contenu associé ne sont pas inclus dans le privilège d’abonnement et peuvent nécessiter des achats séparés pour être débloqués. Conditions d’utilisation : https://www.amanotes.com/terms-and-conditions/ Politique de confidentialité : https://www.amanotes.com/privacy-policy/

*Assistance : Vous avez un problème ? Envoyez un message à magictiles3.support@amanotes.com ou contactez-nous depuis le jeu en vous rendant dans Paramètres > FAQ et Assistance.
descriptionShort: Joue tes chansons préférées au piano! Ce jeu de musique a les derniers tubes.

title:
Magic Tiles 3™ - Piano Game
12.022.009

creator: AMANOTES PTE LTD
descriptionHtml:
🎵 Magic Tiles 3 – The Original Piano Game with Licensed Songs! 🎶

Tap the Piano Tiles & Play Along to 45,000+ Songs!
Magic Tiles 3 is the original piano game that brings you an ever-growing collection of licensed songs from popular artists! Whether you're a piano lover or a fan of music games, rhythm games, and song games, this game has something for you. Updated frequently, our song list ensures there’s always new music to enjoy.

🎹 Why You’ll Love Magic Tiles 3

🎼 45,000+ Songs & Counting – Play hit songs from top artists across genres like pop, EDM, disco, violin, and hip-hop. New songs are added regularly for music lovers!

🎹 Perfect for Piano Lovers – Enjoy a collection of unique piano songs, designed to challenge your skills and deliver a satisfying piano game experience.

🔥 Multiple Difficulty Levels – Whether you’re a casual player or love hard challenges, you can push your limits and try to hit the highest score. Do you have what it takes to master the fastest beats?

🌍 Online Mode & Beat Battles – Compete with friends and players worldwide in thrilling real-time beat battles.

🎁 Exciting Rewards & Unlockables – Keep playing, earn gifts, and unlock new songs and challenges.

🎨 Vibrant Graphics & Smooth Gameplay – Enjoy an immersive music piano game with stunning visuals and a seamless experience.

📩 Need Help?
Email: magictiles3.support@amanotes.com
Or visit Settings > FAQ & Support in the game.

🔗 Terms of Use: amanotes.com/terms-and-conditions
🔐 Privacy Policy: amanotes.com/privacy-policy

🎶 Download Magic Tiles 3 now and enjoy the best piano game with real licensed music! 🎶

creator: AMANOTES PTE LTD
descriptionHtml:
Magic Tiles 3: Tap into the Rhythm of Fun!

Do you adore piano games and grooving to your favorite tunes on piano tiles? Dive into the ultimate music adventure with Magic Tiles 3, a top-notch blend of magic piano games, rhythm challenges, and song games. It's your all-access pass to a world brimming with tunes, beats, and thrilling gameplay that turns every tap into a musical journey. Whether you're a fan of pop, EDM, hip hop, or country music, Magic Tiles 3 has something special just for you. Get ready to unleash your inner musician and discover why this game is a chart-topper in the world of music games!

𝐇𝐎𝐖 𝐓𝐎 𝐏𝐋𝐀𝐘:

Step into the spotlight with Magic Tiles 3, where your mission is to hit the right tiles to the beat of iconic songs, dodging those tricky white tiles. It's not just about hitting the notes; it's about embracing the rhythm and showcasing your reflexes and coordination. If you're up for a challenge that harmonizes your love for music with a test of skill, Magic Tiles 3 is your stage.

𝐆𝐀𝐌𝐄 𝐅𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐄𝐒:

A World of Music: With over 45,000 songs, Magic Tiles 3 offers an unrivaled musical treasure trove, spanning genres from pop to country songs, EDM to hip hop. Its vibrant graphics and smooth gameplay ensure you're hooked, making every session a new adventure in the realm of piano games.

Endless Challenges: New levels, new hits, and endless excitement await in this piano game. Each level brings its own flavor and challenge, with surprises and gifts to fuel your musical voyage. Magic Tiles 3 ensures the melody never fades and the excitement never ends.

Beat Battle Online: Step up in the global arena with Magic Tiles 3’s online mode. Connect with players worldwide and challenge friends to see who reigns supreme in this symphony of tiles. It's a perfect blend of competition and community, all set to the rhythm of your favorite tunes.

Dive into the rhythm of Magic Tiles 3 and let the music guide you to an experience filled with beats, songs, and challenges that will keep your fingers dancing and your heart racing. It's not just a game; it's a musical odyssey waiting to be explored. Download Magic Tiles 3 now and join the community of music lovers who’ve found their rhythm, tapped into their musical talent, and embarked on an unforgettable journey through the most engaging piano tiles game out there.

Support:
Encountering hiccups? We’re here to help! Email us at magictiles3.support@amanotes.com or find us in-game under Settings > FAQ and Support.

descriptionHtml:
Magic Tiles 3 – The Ultimate Piano Game & Music Game Experience! 🎶

Dive into Magic Tiles 3, the definitive piano game loved by millions, best music game all the time. Magic Tiles 3 blends rhythmic gameplay, vibrant visuals, and a massive library of official and licensed music. Prepare to unleash your inner pianist in this addictive song game!

Tap Piano Tiles, Feel the Music!

Magic Tiles 3 is an intuitive yet challenging piano game. Tap the black piano tiles as they cascade down, matching the beat of the game songs. Miss a tile, and the music stops. Hit every note perfectly to create beautiful melodies, experiencing the magic of piano playing. This engaging mechanic makes Magic Tiles 3 one of the most rewarding music games. It’s about feeling the rhythm in this top-tier song game.

Unbeatable Library of Official and Licensed Music!

Magic Tiles 3 stands out with its huge, growing library of 45,000+ game songs. We feature official and licensed music from chart-toppers across Pop, EDM, Disco, Violin, and Hip-Hop. There's a song game experience for every taste. New hits and classics are added frequently, ensuring this premier piano game stays fresh. You won't find such a diverse, quality collection of official and licensed music in many other music games.

Why Magic Tiles 3 is the Piano Game You Need:

- Massive Song Catalogue: Enjoy 45,000+ game songs! Featuring official and licensed music, Magic Tiles 3 offers endless musical fun.
Authentic Piano Game Feel: Designed for piano lovers and rhythm gamers, the piano tiles gameplay provides a uniquely satisfying piano game experience. Feel the music under your fingertips.
- Multiple Difficulty Levels: From casual play to hardcore challenges, Magic Tiles 3 adapts. Master easy tunes or conquer the fastest piano tiles tracks. Push your skills in this dynamic music game.
- Thrilling Multiple Player Battle Mode: Don't just play alone! Engage in real-time multiple player competitions. Challenge friends or global players in the intense battle mode. Prove your rhythm skills in this exciting multiple player arena, a key feature differentiating this piano game.
- Play Anywhere - Game Offline Mode: No internet? No problem! Magic Tiles 3 includes a fantastic Game Offline mode. Enjoy your favorite game songs and practice piano tiles anywhere. This reliable Game Offline feature means the music never has to stop, perfect for commutes or travel.
- Game Free Access: Start playing now! Magic Tiles 3 is a Game Free to download and play. Access a vast selection of game songs and core piano game features without initial cost. Enjoy hours of entertainment in this superb Game Free music game. (Optional purchases available).
- Fun for All Ages - Great Game for Kids: With intuitive controls and diverse music, Magic Tiles 3 is a fantastic Game for kids and adults. It’s a family-friendly music game promoting rhythm and fun. If you need a safe, engaging Game for kid, this is an excellent choice.
- Rewards & Customization: Keep playing this engaging song game to unlock gifts, new game songs, and challenges. Personalize your piano game journey.
- Stunning Visuals & Smooth Play: Immerse yourself in a beautiful music game with vibrant graphics and flawless performance, enhancing your connection to the official and licensed music. It truly feels like the best music game all the time.
